user_query: How much is shipping from Canada to Hong Kong?

matches_faq.question: How much does it cost to ship from Toronto to Hong Kong?
matches_faq.answer: The cost depends on shipment size, weight, service type, and customs requirements. Use our online calculator or contact us directly.

user_query: delivery time to Hong Kong from Toronto

matches_faq.question: How long does shipping from Toronto to Hong Kong take?
matches_faq.answer: Air freight takes 3–7 days, sea freight 20–35 days, and express courier 2–5 days. Customs may affect delivery time.

matches_faq.question: What items are restricted or prohibited from shipping?
matches_faq.answer: We do not carry hazardous materials, perishables without special arrangements, or illegal goods. See our full restriction list.

user_query: Do you pick up from my house?

matches_faq.question: Do you offer door-to-door service?
matches_faq.answer: Yes, we provide convenient door-to-door pickup and delivery services in most locations.

matches_faq.question: Can I track my shipment?
matches_faq.answer: Yes. Use our tracking portal online with your order number to view real-time updates.
